body:
^ Dont read it wrong, im just asking. Why you are still playing on avicus or any other minecraft server and such.

Me: I dont usually play here, i play on alt that no one will know ;), but otherwise im here for my friends and team/Scrim/tourney(s).

Why are you here?

replies.body: Because we can't really afford to lose another admin
replies.body_tagged: Because we can't really afford to lose another admin

replies.body:
I believe it can be one of the most popular and fun servers.

Tbh, OCN is the exact same thing as Avicus only with better staff, better players, a better competitive side, and LESS LAG. That's what I say when I'm giving shit to staff, and when they ask me why I'm still here, I tell them I see real potential in Avicus. Really. But I can't deny that I haven't always said that.

And to those staff members that got offended by me, don't take it personally. I believe in tough love.
replies.body_tagged:
I believe it can be one of the most popular and fun servers.

Tbh, OCN is the exact same thing as Avicus only with better staff, better players, a better competitive side, and LESS LAG. That's what I say when I'm giving shit to staff, and when they ask me why I'm still here, I tell them I see real potential in Avicus. Really. But I can't deny that I haven't always said that.

And to those staff members that got offended by me, don't take it personally. I believe in tough love.
